comment.author: 9031446@N05
comment._content: I'm not sure if this is the place to post this, but the 6th Corps provost marshal, Maj. Thomas W. Hyde, is seated second from the the right.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
This is the right place to post identifying information, background information, and other insights you may have about our holdings on Flickr. Thanks so much for sharing your expertise with us!

- Jill, U.S. National Archives

comment.author: 66406516@N08
comment._content: The badge of the Sixth Corps was the Greek Cross. At least four of the officers in this group are wearing this device.
